author: Russian Bot
comment: I love this face, but I'd love it more if the pumpkin didn't shrink when the watch enters ambient mode. Could you implement that feature?
title: Perfect in October!

author: velvet angel
comment: Nice watch face very customisable with lots of options , good choice .
title: Great little watch face

author: Stewart Wilson,jr
comment: Great watchface highly recommend for the month of October and beyond
title: Happy Halloween!

author: Steven Schwartz
comment: This dev makes great watch faces. I have a few.  I like them all. 5 stars. I am a visually impaired guy. I asked the dev if he could do an update with a more readable font.  Within a few hours not only did he answer my email but he did the update. THANK YOU VERY MUCH
title: Perfect Watch Face

author: Alan Simmonds
comment: Would really like to see this with same color display in ambient mode (but dimmed) for those of us with bigger batteries
title: Always on ambient mode?

author: Joao Carlos Marques
comment: I loved the watch face! Some pumpkins seem like they have less resolution, either way it still looks amazing!
title: Amazing watch face

author: David Taroyan
comment: I really like this watch face.  I was wondering is it possible to have the option to take the date and battery off? It's such a nice face but those make it look cluttered
title: Really cool

author: Joshua Driscoll
comment: Great watch face with nice set of background choices. Only reason I don't give 5 stars is that it seems to display "am" in 12hr mode when it should be "pm".                                    Edit: quick response from the dev, and the " pm" issue is fixed. Thanks!

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Thank you for reporting this so fast! I just published the fix, you should be able to get it within a few hours, depending on Google deployment duration

title: Awesome!

author: James Barbu
comment: Great watch face but just needs that one more thing.. See subject :)
title: Needs phone battery life option

author: Jay Butcher
comment: 4.5 stars since no phone battery option. Very nice though.
title: Very Nice!

author: Joseph Loccisano
comment: So far, so good.  Like the choices for pumpkin faces.

author: Mike G
comment: Nice watch face fun and good  options
title: Clean

author: Jason Adams
comment: Halloween faces on the watch are fabulous
